name: INVASIVE (itch)
description:
It is said there exists a place between dimensions, a realm bereft of logic and emotion, where fear bleeds into the structures of the mind. Here, even a lonely bus stop may suddenly become the repository for these cosmic castoffs — fragments of matter and time, lost and wandering through the dark behind the stars. You enter here, a traveler, unsure of your destination, or what you left behind as the trees and buildings give way to this quiet little valley. Even the soft hiss and thrum of the receding bus is little more than a painted memory, floating on the edge of a painful migraine. 

Prepare to be invaded.

WASD to move/E to interact -- Esc key to quit game.

Best played with headphones.

A game by @stumpheadjosh and @Jordanopoly.
